Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Exceptions
  • Deprecated Fields
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Constructors
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    org.apache.iceberg.expressions.ExpressionVisitors.BoundExpressionVisitor
    use ExpressionVisitors.BoundVisitor instead
    org.apache.iceberg.parquet.ParquetWriteAdapter
    use ParquetWriter
  • Deprecated Exceptions 
    Exceptions and Description
    org.apache.iceberg.exceptions.RuntimeIOException
    Use java.io.UncheckedIOException directly instead. Exception used to wrap IOException as a RuntimeException and add context.
  • Deprecated Fields 
    Field and Description
    org.apache.spark.sql.catalyst.parser.extensions.IcebergSqlExtensionsParser.tokenNames
    Use IcebergSqlExtensionsParser.VOCABULARY instead.
    org.apache.spark.sql.catalyst.parser.extensions.IcebergSqlExtensionsLexer.tokenNames
    Use IcebergSqlExtensionsLexer.VOCABULARY instead.
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    org.apache.spark.sql.catalyst.parser.extensions.IcebergSqlExtensionsParser.getTokenNames()
    org.apache.spark.sql.catalyst.parser.extensions.IcebergSqlExtensionsLexer.getTokenNames()
    org.apache.iceberg.TableMetadata.newTableMetadata(TableOperations, Schema, PartitionSpec, String, Map<String, String>)
    will be removed in 0.9.0; use newTableMetadata(Schema, PartitionSpec, String, Map) instead.
    org.apache.iceberg.TableMetadataParser.read(TableOperations, InputFile)
    will be removed in 0.9.0; use read(FileIO, InputFile) instead.
    org.apache.iceberg.Table.rollback()
    Replaced by Table.manageSnapshots()
    org.apache.iceberg.Rollback.toSnapshotAtTime(long)
    Replaced by ManageSnapshots.rollbackToTime(long)
    org.apache.iceberg.Rollback.toSnapshotId(long)
    Replaced by ManageSnapshots.setCurrentSnapshot(long)
    org.apache.iceberg.OverwriteFiles.validateNoConflictingAppends(Long, Expression)
    this will be removed in 0.11.0; use OverwriteFiles.validateNoConflictingAppends(Expression) and OverwriteFiles.validateFromSnapshot(long) instead
    org.apache.iceberg.BaseOverwriteFiles.validateNoConflictingAppends(Long, Expression)
    org.apache.iceberg.transforms.PartitionSpecVisitor.visit(Schema, PartitionSpec, PartitionSpecVisitor<R>)
    this will be removed in 0.11.0; use PartitionSpecVisitor.visit(PartitionSpec, PartitionSpecVisitor) instead.
  • Deprecated Constructors 
    Constructor and Description
    org.apache.iceberg.hadoop.HadoopCatalog(String, Configuration, String)
    please use the no-arg constructor, setConf and initialize to construct the catalog. Will be removed in v0.12.0
    org.apache.iceberg.hadoop.HadoopCatalog(String, Configuration, String, Map<String, String>)
    please use the no-arg constructor, setConf and initialize to construct the catalog. Will be removed in v0.12.0
    org.apache.iceberg.hive.HiveCatalog(String, String, int, Configuration)
    please use the no-arg constructor, setConf and initialize to construct the catalog. Will be removed in v0.12.0
    org.apache.iceberg.hive.HiveCatalog(String, String, String, int, Configuration)
    please use the no-arg constructor, setConf and initialize to construct the catalog. Will be removed in v0.12.0
    org.apache.iceberg.hive.HiveCatalog(String, String, String, int, Configuration, Map<String, String>)
    please use the no-arg constructor, setConf and initialize to construct the catalog. Will be removed in v0.12.0
    org.apache.iceberg.Metrics(Long, Map<Integer, Long>, Map<Integer, Long>, Map<Integer, Long>)
    will be removed in 0.12.0; use Metrics.Metrics(Long, Map, Map, Map, Map) instead.
    org.apache.iceberg.Metrics(Long, Map<Integer, Long>, Map<Integer, Long>, Map<Integer, Long>, Map<Integer, ByteBuffer>, Map<Integer, ByteBuffer>)
    will be removed in 0.12.0; use Metrics.Metrics(Long, Map, Map, Map, Map, Map, Map) instead.
